p: If additionally there is much wind, early flashover may result in very fast fire spread to close and distant structures representing a huge challenge for the firefighters [ 29]. Indoor relative humidity of inhabited (heated) wooden structures may therefore represent an important indicator regarding the fast development and severity of a potential building fire [ 37]. Such a technical telltale may be important for contingency planning, resource allocations [ 57] and warnings to the public about increased fire risk.
